AltName.entry: ENGLISH FOLK DANCE AND SONG SOCIETY - SOUTH YORKSHIRE DISTRICT (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Classes and workshops most evenings. Dances held most Saturday evenings.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Classes held in Hunters Bar, Mosborough, Deepcar, Chapeltown, Grenoside and Wharncliffe Side, please contact for further details
